entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as the one who receives a jumper from someone every year. The text states that his jumper is always maroon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who tries the fudge and comments on how nice it is to receive presents.

relationships.description: Ron receives a jumper from someone every year.
Harry receives presents from someone, including fudge and sweets.
